tidynorm 0.1.0
  • Reference

Delta F Method

norm_deltaF.Rd

Delta F Method

Usage

norm_deltaF(
  .data,
  ...,
  .by = NULL,
  .by_formant = FALSE,
  .drop_orig = FALSE,
  .keep_params = FALSE,
  .names = "{.col}_df"
)

Arguments

.data

A data frame containing vowel formant data

...

<tidy-select> One or more unquoted expressions separated by commas. These should target the vowel formant data columns.

.by

<tidy-select> A selection of columns to group by. Typically a column of speaker IDs.

.by_formant

Ignored by this procedure

.drop_orig

Whether or not to drop the original formant data columns.

.keep_params

Whether or not to keep the Location (*_L) and scale (*_S) normalization parameters

.names

A glue::glue() expression for naming the normalized data columns. The "{.col}" portion corresponds to the name of the original formant columns.
